name: NBCNews
text:
RT @MeetThePress: WATCH NOW: Decision 2020: 100 days to go

Watch an NBC News special on the presidential race and see how the campaign funding war is heating up

https://t.co/RfPdNMLYVh https://t.co/RSbksIyrDi

name: NBCNews
text: Analysis: President Trump is reluctantly accepting that the politics of coronavirus are tightly tied to the threats it poses to his fellow Americans. https://t.co/q42jWXyMn7

name: NBCNews
text: Preliminary data shows reports of child abuse around the US have plunged during the pandemic. Experts fear the amount of abuse has actually risen. https://t.co/srApGhx3UF

name: NBCNews
text:
It was the deadliest human trafficking tragedy in the U.S. in at least a decade. 

Now, some of the survivors feel the threat of coronavirus. https://t.co/Y4bjQ3yqtf

name: NBCNews
text: Nigerian refugee creates New York City's first full-time shelter for asylum-seekers. https://t.co/TUNCCEixBV

name: NBCNews
text:
Election experts warn that Americans may not know who won the presidency or the Senate on Election Night.

A surge of mail-in votes and rules about how they're counted in key states like Pennsylvania and Michigan could delay results for days. https://t.co/RNvne7ov2n

name: NBCNews
text:
John Lewis, civil rights giant, crosses infamous Selma bridge one final time.

“His final march, that final crossing, so different than the first, speaks to the legacy that he leaves behind and the lives that he changed,” Rep. Sewell said. https://t.co/EvpeNiyfHZ

name: NBCNews
text: Black Americans' genes reflect the hardships and realities of slavery. https://t.co/wTCedACbKu - @NBCBLK

name: NBCNews
text: President Trump's convention cancellation is costing GOP donors millions, according to multiple Republicans familiar with the finances. https://t.co/CL7hLuMubT

name: NBCNews
text: Florida news reporter reveals cancer diagnosis after viewer spots lump on her neck. https://t.co/MLAT6dwTF1

name: NBCNews
text: Celebrities, politicians and other high profile Brits have pledged to join a 48-hour "walkout" from Twitter to protest what they say is an inadequate response to anti-Semitic tweets from a rapper. https://t.co/9KEqsfkDnR

name: NBCNews
text: Preventing the next pandemic will cost $22,200,000,000 a year, scientists say. https://t.co/60RIF2OXXK

name: NBCNews
text:
A car drove through a crowd and a protester was shot in the Denver suburb of Aurora during demonstrations against racial injustice. 

Police said a protester fired a weapon, striking at least one person, who was listed as stable at a hospital. https://t.co/8yenLFI7Ab

name: NBCNews
text: Olivia de Havilland, an iconic actress of Hollywood's Golden Age and last surviving cast member of 'Gone with the Wind,' has died at age 104, her representatives say. https://t.co/wAMPuOlCkN

name: NBCNews
text: Heavy rain and wind gusts battered Maui on Sunday as Category 1 Hurricane Douglas swirled off the coast of Hawaii and officials urged residents to take shelter. https://t.co/2HWQekYdKC

name: NBCNews
text: Engaged couples are being forced to decide whether to go ahead with weddings and endanger the health of their loved ones — or postpone and risk losing thousands of dollars in deposits. https://t.co/rt5SRnEI4N

name: NBCNews
text:
The U.S. says it has closed its consulate in Chengdu in China. 

China ordered the Chengdu consulate to close after the U.S. ordered to shut down the Chinese Consulate in Houston last week. https://t.co/K9VUYXxG4E
